com.ibm.is.cc.javastage.api

Interface Configuration


  • public interface Configuration
    Interface that describes information about the environment and numbers and types of links connected to this stage.
    Version:
    1.0
    See Also:
    Link, InputLink, OutputLink, Processor.validateConfiguration(com.ibm.is.cc.javastage.api.Configuration, boolean)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Configuration.SparseLookupMode
      An enumeration mode represents the lookup configuration and the behavior on the lookup failure.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String ENGINE_NAME_KEY
      Constant that identifies the key for engine name
      static String ENGINE_NAME_PARALLEL
      Constant that identifies the name of parallel engine.
      static String JOB_NAME_KEY
      Constant that identifies the key for job name
      static String LOCALE_KEY
      Constant that identifies the key for locale
      static String PROJECT_NAME_KEY
      Constant that identifies the key for project name
      static String STAGE_NAME_KEY
      Constant that identifies the key for stage name

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DataChannel getDataChannel()
      Retrieves a DataChannel object instance for data transfer service between the conductor and player nodes if the capability to run the user's code on the conductor node is set true by calling the Capabilities.setIsRunOnConductor(boolean) method in the Processor.getCapabilities() method.
      InputLink getInputLink(int linkIndex)
      Retrieves an input link given its index.
      int getInputLinkCount()
      Retrieves the number of input links connected to this stage.
      List<InputLink> getInputLinks()
      Retrieves a list of input links connected to this stage.
      List<Link> getLinks()
      Retrieves a list of links connected to this stage.
      int getNodeCount()
      Retrieves the number of DataStage nodes mapped to the Stage.
      int getNodeNumber()
      Retrieves the node number of the DataStage node where player process is running.
      OutputLink getOutputLink(int linkIndex)
      Retrieves an output link(stream, reject and reference) given its index.
      int getOutputLinkCount()
      Retrieves the number of output links, including reject and reference links, connected to this stage.
      List<OutputLink> getOutputLinks()
      Retrieves a list of output links, including reject and referece links, connected to this stage.
      int getRejectLinkCount()
      Retrieves the number of reject links connected to this stage.
      Properties getRuntimeEnvironment()
      Retrieves properties that provide information about the runtime environment.
      Configuration.SparseLookupMode getSparseLookupMode()
      Retrieves the sparse lookup mode.
      OutputLink getStreamOutputLink(int linkIndex)
      Retrieves an output stream link given its index.
      int getStreamOutputLinkCount()
      Retrieves the number of output stream links connected to this stage.
      Properties getUserProperties()
      Retrieves a set of user properties for the stage.

    • Method Detail

      • getRuntimeEnvironment

        Properties getRuntimeEnvironment()
        Retrieves properties that provide information about the runtime environment. Supported types are:
        • LOCALE_KEY
        • ENGINE_NAME_KEY
        • PROJECT_NAME_KEY
        • STAGE_NAME_KEY
        • JOB_NAME_KEY
        Returns:
        A Properties object.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException

      • getLinks

        List<Link> getLinks()
        Retrieves a list of links connected to this stage.
        Returns:
        A list of Link objects.

      • getInputLinks

        List<InputLink> getInputLinks()
        Retrieves a list of input links connected to this stage.
        Returns:
        A list of InputLink objects.

      • getOutputLinks

        List<OutputLink> getOutputLinks()
        Retrieves a list of output links, including reject and referece links, connected to this stage.
        Returns:
        A list of OutputLink objects.

      • getInputLinkCount

        int getInputLinkCount()
        Retrieves the number of input links connected to this stage.
        Returns:
        The input link count.

      • getOutputLinkCount

        int getOutputLinkCount()
        Retrieves the number of output links, including reject and reference links, connected to this stage.
        Returns:
        The output link count.

      • getStreamOutputLinkCount

        int getStreamOutputLinkCount()
        Retrieves the number of output stream links connected to this stage.
        Returns:
        The output stream link count.

      • getRejectLinkCount

        int getRejectLinkCount()
        Retrieves the number of reject links connected to this stage.
        Returns:
        The reject link count.

      • getInputLink

        InputLink getInputLink(int linkIndex)
        Retrieves an input link given its index.
        Parameters:
        linkIndex - The position of an input link in the stage.
        Returns:
        A InputLink object
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - If the linkIndex is invalid. This is a runtime exception that does not have to be explicitly caught.

      • getOutputLink

        OutputLink getOutputLink(int linkIndex)
        Retrieves an output link(stream, reject and reference) given its index.
        Parameters:
        linkIndex - The position of an output link in the stage.
        Returns:
        A OutputLink object
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - If the linkIndex is invalid. This is a runtime exception that does not have to be explicitly caught.

      • getStreamOutputLink

        OutputLink getStreamOutputLink(int linkIndex)
        Retrieves an output stream link given its index.
        Parameters:
        linkIndex - The position of an output stream link in the stage.
        Returns:
        A OutputLink object
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - If the linkIndex is invalid. This is a runtime exception that does not have to be explicitly caught.

      • getUserProperties

        Properties getUserProperties()
        Retrieves a set of user properties for the stage.
        Returns:
        A Properties object that presents a set of user properties.

      • getNodeNumber

        int getNodeNumber()
        Retrieves the node number of the DataStage node where player process is running.

        The typical use is generating rows under multi-node environment. If user wants to devide up a source table by some number of rows for parallel processing, this node number and node count can be used for this case.

        Returns:
        The node number starts from 0. -1 indicates that collection of nodes on which to run connector has not yet been selected.
        See Also:
        getNodeCount()

      • getNodeCount

        int getNodeCount()
        Retrieves the number of DataStage nodes mapped to the Stage.
        Returns:
        The node count.
        See Also:
        getNodeNumber()

      • getSparseLookupMode

        Configuration.SparseLookupMode getSparseLookupMode()
        Retrieves the sparse lookup mode.
        This method can be used at run-time only. UnsupportedOperationException is thrown if it is called at design time.
        Returns:
        The sparse lookup mode.
        See Also:
        Configuration.SparseLookupMode

      • getDataChannel

        DataChannel getDataChannel()
        Retrieves a DataChannel object instance for data transfer service between the conductor and player nodes if the capability to run the user's code on the conductor node is set true by calling the Capabilities.setIsRunOnConductor(boolean) method in the Processor.getCapabilities() method. Otherwise, null. This method can be used at run-time only. UnsupportedOperationException is thrown if it is called at design time.
        Returns:
        A DataChannel object instance
        See Also:
        DataChannel, Capabilities.isRunOnConductor(), Capabilities.setIsRunOnConductor(boolean)
